description: Update an existing user credential classification
permissions: Admins can update user credential classifications; non-admins can update classifications for organizations they are members of.
validation_notes: An ID argument is required. At least one of --name, --description, --issuer-name, or --external-id must be provided. Name must be unique within the organization. External ID, if provided, must be unique within the organization.

flags.name: --external-id
flags.validation: If provided, must be unique within the organization.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: If provided, must be unique within the organization.
